name: Cloud Data Engineer (Senior Consultant)
description:
Who we're looking for

A suitable candidate for this position should have:

  • BS or higher degree in Computer Science, Natural Sciences, Mathematics, Economics or other comparable education.
  • Experience with the analytics services and containers of one or more public cloud providers (Google Cloud Platform, MS Azure, AWS)
  • Experience with SQL databases and/or big data tools such as Hadoop, Kafka, Apache Spark, NoSQL databases.
  • Forward-looking way of working, ability to work in a team and a high level of commitment
  • Independent and structured way of working
  • Experience with agile software development and project procedures
  • Proficiency in English, both spoken and written
  • Relevant training courses & certificates will be as advantage
  • Programming experience (e.g. C/C++, Java, Python or Scala) will be considered as an advantage
  • Experience with Linux and bash scripting will be as advantage

Your future role

Interested in developing the next generation cloud platform for cognitive analytics? In the area of Artificial Intelligence & Data, we support our customers with a holistic approach on their way to become data-driven organization. We help our customers to make strategic decisions and to react to changes timely by creating a competitive advantage for our customers.

Exciting tasks await you:

  • Development and construction of innovative data analytics platforms for our customers with the most modern technologies
  • Together with other analytics experts, you support our customers from data strategy concepts design to the development of modern data & analytics architectures and the implementation of specific use cases
  • Development of high-availability data platforms on multi or hybrid cloud infrastructures with complex and distributed data pipelines
  • Professional and technical conception of first-class data & analytics solutions in terms of architecture, data modeling and integration
  • Optimization of analytics solutions in the cloud concerning costs, runtime and stability
  • Support our customers on important strategic or operational tasks in order to advance their digitization
  • Coach younger teammates and train them professionally, technically and personally

We are looking to further build our international center of excellence in Riga and offer relocation to Baltic countries.

For people willing to relocate to Riga, we will arrange EU work and residence permits. Riga is a beautiful cosmopolitan town, with vivid nightlife, sandy beaches of Jurmala and excellent connection to most European cities.

What we offer

This job gives you an opportunity to work on projects for the world’s largest companies with cutting edge technologies. We help our clients to transform their business through AI and technology and you will make personal contribution to this transformation, work with modern tools, alongside highly experienced professionals from around the world. Deloitte will give you unmatched access to training programs and development opportunities.

We offer a pleasant, collegial, cosmopolitan atmosphere in a firm that unites technologists, financiers, auditors, tax advisors and lawyers.

A comprehensive variety of programs and resources to support your professional development, health and well-being needs:

  • Work for well-known brands
  • Free drinks in the office
  • Health insurance (one amount package)
  • Home office
  • Team-building activities
  • Constant growth and development
  • Recruitment Incentive Program – Stars
  • Flexible working hours
  • Language courses
  • Sick Days (2 days)
  • Parking
  • International travel insurance
  • Multiple geographies and clients
  • Financial support for professional development
  • Incentive and bonus system
  • Leaders supporting career development
  • Wellbeing initiatives
  • Challenging tasks
  • Access to new technologies
  • Competitive salary
  • Local and international career opportunities

About Deloitte

Deloitte is the largest consulting firm in the world with the headcount of 334,800 operating across over 150 countries. The size of our business in Analytics, AI, Cloud, Cyber, and Blockchain is $7.7B with the headcount of 33,200. It is consistently recognized as a global market leader:

#1 on Vision in Analytics and Data Services by Gartner

#1 on Public Cloud IT Transformation Services by Gartner

#1 on Strategy in Enterprise Insight Services by Forrester

#1 in Capabilities and Strategies in Business Analytics Consulting and Systems Integration Services by IDC.

Deloitte prides to be one of the most progressive employers. We focus on fueling improvement, not monitoring or giving grades. You could read about our approach to talent at: https://hbr.org/2015/04/reinventing-performance-management. Now, we are using pandemic as the opportunity to re-architect work, empower the workforce and adapt the workplace.

Recruitment Journey

Please address your applications, in English, to Olga Presa or Jelizaveta Lebedeva from our Riga team. If selected, they will contact you and will help to navigate through the recruitment process.
